de:
Decision 2/2013 of the EFTA-Peru Joint Committee- Amendments to Appendix V regarding Rules of Origin and Administrative Cooperation: 
List of Working or Processing required to be
carried out on Non-Originating Materials in order
that the Product manufactured can obtain Originating
Status  - 17-04-2013 - Freihandelsabkommen vom 14. Juli 2010 zwischen der Republik Peru und den EFTA-Staaten (mit Anhängen)
en:
Decision 2/2013 of the EFTA-Peru Joint Committee- Amendments to Appendix V regarding Rules of Origin and Administrative Cooperation: 
List of Working or Processing required to be
carried out on Non-Originating Materials in order
that the Product manufactured can obtain Originating
Status  - 17-04-2013 - Free Trade Agreement between the Republic of Peru and the EFTA States
it:
Decision 2/2013 of the EFTA-Peru Joint Committee- Amendments to Appendix V regarding Rules of Origin and Administrative Cooperation: 
List of Working or Processing required to be
carried out on Non-Originating Materials in order
that the Product manufactured can obtain Originating
Status  - 17-04-2013 - Accordo di libero scambio del 14 luglio 2010 tra la Repubblica del Perù e gli Stati dell'AELS (con all.)
fr:
Decision 2/2013 of the EFTA-Peru Joint Committee- Amendments to Appendix V regarding Rules of Origin and Administrative Cooperation: 
List of Working or Processing required to be
carried out on Non-Originating Materials in order
that the Product manufactured can obtain Originating
Status  - 17-04-2013 - Accord de libre-échange du 14 juillet 2010 entre la République du Pérou et les Etats de l'AELE (avec annexes)
